abstract: Greg Smith, a Goldman Sachs executive director, explains why he is resigning from the firm in an Op-Ed column for The New York Times. He says clients' interests continue to be sidelined in how the firm operates and thinks about making money. "I can honestly say that the environment now is as toxic and destructive as I have ever seen it," he added.

headline.main: Goldman Executive Explains Why He's Resigning
